content: The Immortal Blessing Gourd is one of the strongest Gourds in Black Myth: Wukong, with one of the most unique abilities out of the entire range of them. Due to its strength, and the fact it has 8 uses by default, the Immortal Blessing Gourd can't be upgraded.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Immortal_Blessing_Gourd.md', within the main section titled 'Immortal Blessing Gourd'.
The content is as follows:
The Immortal Blessing Gourd is one of the strongest Gourds in Black Myth: Wukong, with one of the most unique abilities out of the entire range of them. Due to its strength, and the fact it has 8 uses by default, the Immortal Blessing Gourd can't be upgraded.
